snippet.title: Happy Game - E3 2021 Trailer
snippet.description:
Happy Game is releasing on Windows, Mac, and Nintendo Switch this fall.

Wishlist on Steam: https://bit.ly/HappyGameSteam
Wishlist on Nintendo: https://bit.ly/HappyGameSwitch

Happy Game just made an appearance at E3 during the Future Games Show with a brand new trailer featuring lots of new footage. That's the good part. The less good part is that we won't be able to deliver the game this spring as we originally estimated. Happy Game is doing very well, but we need a few more months to make sure you'll get a well-functioning game on both PC and Switch. We're now aiming to release Happy Game this fall. Thank you for understanding!

A little boy falls asleep to a horrible nightmare. Can you make him happy again?

- Brand new psychedelic horror adventure from the creators of Botanicula and CHUCHEL
- Endure and escape three unforgettable nightmares
- Solve deeply disturbing puzzles in (not so) charming environments
- Deal with suspicious smiley faces and pink bunnies
- Creepy songs and screeches from the Czech freak-folk band DVA
